Install CLI

Requirements

  • Windows 10, Mac OSX, Linux
  • Node.js v12 or higher

Install

Mac (Homebrew)

$ brew install Lalvar-cli

NPM (Homebrew)

$ npm install Lalvar-cli

Yarn (Homebrew)

$ yarn install Lalvar-cli
